title: Make a Premium Payment
description: A customer calls to make a one-time payment on their homeowner's insurance policy with a credit card.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their policy to find the amount due.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the customer's policy and the outstanding balance.

tasks.description: Securely collect the customer's credit card information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately and securely captures the payment details.

tasks.description: Process the payment and provide a confirmation number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the payment and provides the correct confirmation number to the customer.
